channel.title: history on Rohit Goswami
channel.description: Recent content in history on Rohit Goswami

item.title: Regarding Quansight Labs
item.description: Towards sustainable FOSS with Quansight Labs Background Rumors of my affiliation with Quansight Labs are indeed true. I have had the pleasure of joining the Labs division as a software engineerÂ 1, whose philosophy is fantastically and succintly described by their director Dr. Ralf Gommers. This means, in nutshell, that in my spare time I will be able to contribute to the continued maintenance of key FOSS projects. Why? A reasonable question.

item.title: Fortran, GSoC21 and Me
item.description: Reminisces and prophecies brought upon by LFortran and GSoC 2021 Background I know not what the language of the future will look like, but I know it will be called FORTRAN… <br> — Charles Anthony Richard Hoare, circa 1982 <br> – Daan Frenkel, 2020 This post is a little belated, given that the GSoC announcements were a few days ago. Therein lies the future, and much digital ink, sweat and blood shall be spilled towards accomplishing the goals outlined in my accepted project proposal.
